capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's amazing to think about what he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world just because you're a target for Lord Voldemort? It's incredible that he was able to overcome all those obstacles and become one of the most iconic heroes in the fight against darkness.
